feature.label: Flex4 Feature
feature.description: The Flex4 feature bundles a version of Adobe's opensource Flex4 SDK and integrates it into the Axdt project. Sources, samples and Air related files are removed from the bundled SDK.
feature.copyright: (c) Martin Schnabel mb0@mb0.org --- Look for notice or readme files for origins of bundled content.

You can find a copy of the license and more information within the plugins artifacts.
